categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "The Corellian" was the nickname of a notorious male gangster from the planet Corellia who was active during the Cold War between the Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic. The Corellian owned a stronghold inside of Mount Avilatan, an active volcano on the island of Avilatan on the planet Ord Mantell, but the Corellian disappeared during the early years of the Separatist War between the Republic-supported planetary government and the Mantellian Separatist Movement. The separatists soon moved into the stronghold and made it their command center, though the Republic was unable to determine whether the Corellian had joined the movement or been forced to give them his base.

The Corellian was first mentioned in the Codex entry for the separatist stronghold in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011; the entry did not specify the gangster's species.
